meanings.definition: Unisexes: designed to be suitable for both sexes
meanings.sent1: The store sells unisexes clothing that can be worn by anyone.
meanings.sent2: The new unisexes bathroom is accessible to both men and women.
meanings.sent3: The unisexes hats were so popular that they sold out in a day.
meanings.sent4: Her unisexes approach to fashion design challenged traditional gender norms.
meanings.sent5: The unisexes logo on the sign indicated that the store welcomed everyone.

meanings.definition: Unisexes: items or products that are not specifically for males or females
meanings.sent1: The shop offers a variety of unisexes for customers to choose from.
meanings.sent2: Many parents prefer to buy unisexes baby clothes before the baby is born.
meanings.sent3: The unisexes in the store caught the eye of both men and women.
meanings.sent4: His collection of unisexes included accessories that appealed to all genders.
meanings.sent5: The brand's commitment to unisexes was evident in their diverse product range.
